promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young epic goat fire-type pokemon wearing regal bracers. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrocaper, a a young epic goat fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Burning Slam-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "fire" or "Pyrocaper". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, goat-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Pyrocaper: Dashes across arid expanses with scorching hooves, creating spark showers with its combustive stomps. Exhibits Burning Slam-GX prowess.
